    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Goal</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">Get an overview over all iterations and provide a detail view for a single iteration.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Preconditions</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">The user is a member of the project for which he wants to browse through the iterations.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Basic flow</b></td>
      <td colspan="4"> 
      
<OL>
<LI>The user chooses _show more_ at the bottom of the iteration area at the project details page</LI>
<LI>The system provide a table with all available iterations</LI>
<LI>The user chooses a iteration and select _edit_
<UL>
<LI>name</LI>
<LI>description</LI>
<LI>start date</LI>
<LI>end date</LI>
<LI>duration of the iteration</LI>
<LI>documented by</LI>
<LI>creation date</LI>
</UL>
</LI>

</OL>
